tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: Let's do a quick check on the take position event and then address the elephant in the room: we have errors!

paragraphs.text: We mentioned earlier that when either the take position event or the trigger off event validates true, the trigger stage closes.
Well, we can see the Trigger Stage closing on Feb 28th, at 9 hs... right after two consecutive hourly closes below the lower band! So far so good!
But we have errors immediately after that! Can you figure out what's going on?
